categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: The Alliance Cabinet, also referred to as the Cabinet, and sometimes informally called the Political High Command, was a branch of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's Civil Government. Arranged beneath the Alliance's titular chief of state, the cabinet was made up of six allied ministers with specific portfolios, including finance, industry, education, state, supply, and war, and were led by the Secretary of the Cabinet.
